val:
• Introduced supervised contrastive loss to generate discriminative embeddings for text classification.
  • The proposed loss function lead to an improvement of 10% on the Trec-6 dataset and up to 4% on SST-2 dataset on 15% acquired data, thereby beating the current state-of-the-art method.
  • In this study, we have shown that using contrastive learning is better than MLM for sentence representation in low-data regime. We also show that the embeddings generated by contrastive learning are discriminative.
